doc:
Drew Bundini Brown https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drew_Bundini_Brown 0 Drew Bundini Brown (March 21, 1928 – September 24, 1987) was an assistant trainer and cornerman of Muhammad Ali, as well as occasional film actor. He was portrayed by actors Bernie Mac and Jamie Foxx in the films Don King: Only in America, and Ali respectively. Drew_Bundini_Brown ( March_21_,_1928 – September_24_,_1987 ) was an_assistant_trainer_and_cornerman of Muhammad_Ali , as_well_as occasional_film_actor . He was_portrayed by actors_Bernie_Mac_and_Jamie_Foxx in the_films_Don_King : Only in America , and Ali respectively .
